But for me the most impressive part of the climb are the four distinct ecological zones:
the Rainforest from 7,000 and 9,000 feet;
the Moorland Zone at 10,000 feet;
the Heather Zone at 13,000 feet;
and the Alpine Desert at 15,000 feet
where plants experience summer temperatures during the day and winter temperatures at night.
